summary: A ridiculously dirty dirt replacer for humans and Khajiit.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Really Dirty Dirt:
------------------------------[/b]

[i]Description:[/i]
I never was a fan of the vanilla dirt. In the old days, I just used a blank texture to remove the dirt entirely. This meant my characters could never be dirty, but that NPCs would still use the dirt.

This changed. I became bored of not having dirty characters, so I opened up GIMP and drew up six quick dirt replacers. This took me about 10 minutes, so they aren't exactly high quality replacers. I was more messing around than anything.

The first dirt tint has been changed so that it isn't really all that dirty. Compared to the others, it's downright clean.

The second dirt tint is a fair bit dirtier than the first. At this point, your character may consider having a bath.

The third dirt tint is a lot dirtier than the first. So dirty, in fact, that NPCs might give your character a look of disgust. No self-respecting man/woman would wander around with that much dirt. Not unless you were a poor farmer, anyway.

This is a texture replacer, but it affects human races, elven races, and Khajiit. Why Khajiit? Because they use the human dirt tints. Argonians have their own, but Khajiit use the human ones.


[i]Installation:[/i]
To install, drag and drop the folder into your data folder and overwrite when asked. Or use NMM.
To uninstall, delete the files. Or just use NMM.

[i]Compatibility:[/i]
This is not compatible with any mod that edits dirt textures.

[i]Requirement:[/i]
The use of the 2k or 1k versions requires SKSE 1.6.6 or newer. Otherwise, they will not display properly in-game. The SKSE.ini file must have the following line:

[b]
[Display]
iTintTextureResolution=2048
[/b]

The resolution should be replaced with the one you use (2048 or 1024).

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xLdZTNC.png[/img][/url][/center][/center]
author: Mauin
